channel.title: Welfare on Betting On Success

item.title: Why Save When It's Free?
item.description: I’ve well versed in most areas of personal finance, at least what pertains to me. Many, especially in the US, need to be saving a lot more $ instead of constantly going into debt to get a car that costs more than their annual salary or the newest IPhone that costs more than their monthly salary. For those of us that save and are responsible with money, we may ask why others don’t save when a $500 emergency could end them?
